sect1.title: Looking Forward to GNOME &nextversion;
sect1.para: Naturally, development doesn't stop with GNOME &gnomeversion;. Six months from the day that GNOME &gnomeversion; is released GNOME &nextversion; will follow and build on the base of its predecessor.

Things to look forward to in GNOME &nextversion; should include:
A major new version of GNOME's Ekiga VoIP client with a revamped user interface and SIP presence support.
